updates: - fix: potential failure when creating channels.
- fix: temporarily disable WebSocket due to unstable connection.
- add: WebSocket migration.
- attempt fix: potential contact list crash.
- fix: username overflow in message tiles.
- fix: an issue in server version comparator.
- fix: some contact list updating and display issues.
- fix: minor UI fixes.
- fix: possible avatar error in server switch drawer.
- feature: change password in settings.
- fix: channel invitation link generation permissions and link port display issue.
- fix: server URL validation issue.
- fix: channel members page might show an incomplete member list.
- fix: some other known bug fixes.
- feature: QR code scanning supported with images in chats and from phone gallery.
- feature: jump to corresponding server and chat when jumping from push notifications.
- fix: some known bug fixes.
- refactor: swipe left / long press to chat UX improved.
- refactor: error message display improvements.
- fix: disable textfield if user is blocked.
- fix: user list not complete issue.
- fix: other known issue fixes.
- add: Swipe left (iOS) or Long Press (Android) actions to chat tiles.
- add: Search by name in contact search.
- fix: chat update issue before initial connection completes.
- fix: minor UI color changes.
- fix: mute setting might not work correctly.
- fix: other known issue fixes.
- fix: information updating issue in chats which are pushed from contact detail page.
- fix: unread count display issue in chat bar.
- fix: unread count synchronization issue.
- add: new realtime response to server settings (server name, description, online status switch etc.
- refactor: new user settings read and storage strategy for better performance.
- fix: full screen image does not show up when tapped.
- fix: other bug fixes.
- refactor: remove 'Clear local data' button to avoid a notification issue.
- fix: default language might be mistakenly set to Simplified Chinese.
- fix: archive content loading status issue.
- fix: some video bubble fixes.
- fix: other bug fixes.
- add: mute and pin chats.
- fix: chats might be loaded slowly due to a file fetch error.
- fix: other bug fixes.
- fix: multiple bug fixes.
- add: specified bubble for video messages.
- add: show url and its hyperlink for text messages.
- refactor: QR code scanning and invitation link handling.
- refactor: minor improvement on video page.
- fix: images might be mistakenly shown deleted.
- fix: one issue that may cause unsuccessful update of auth tokens.
- fix: a known retry issue that may cause unsuccessful connection retries.
- fix: contact status update error.
- add: right align messages sent by yourself (settings in Web client only).
- add: contact mode (settings in Web client only).
- add: remove user from server button in contact page for admins.
- add: pinch to zoom in image viewer.
- refactor: performance improvements on message list.
- refactor: QR code scan and invitation link strategy.
- fix: language changed to on-device settings only.
- fix: camera and microphone permission error in image selector.
- fix: some other issues.
- fix: login keyboard focus issues.
- fix: messages might be duplicated.
- fix: history message fetch issue in DMs.
- fix: resend feature for unsuccessful messages in chats.
- add: save draft for chats.
- refactor: performance improvements.
- fix: preliminary network fixes.
- fix: direct messages might not show up after initial data loading.
- add: fetch history messages in channels before user is registered.
- fix: some database and performance fixes.
- fix: error in login process
- refactor: performance improvements.
- add: audio messages.
- refactor: avatar data storage and fetching strategy.
- fix: HEIF image sending issue.
- fix: magic link parameter parsing issue.
- fix: messages might still appear when they are deleted.
- fix: gif image messages do not animate.
- fix: potential app stall when fetching user avatars.
- fix: disable auto-delete message for chats with user themselves.
- fix: some internationalization issues.
- fix: self-build preparation.
- fix: issue when doing registration with an app without login status.
- fix: license issue when sending files in private chats.
- fix: minor change in status monitoring strategy.
- fix: license issue in chat message sending.
- add: customizable url version.
- add: scan qr code to login.
- fix: token issues in registration process.
- fix: message deletion process.
- fix: network issue on previous versions.
- fix: multiple bug fixes and performance improvement.
- add: Push notification re-register page.
- fix: image sending status issue.
- refactor: image widget, support viewing all images in a chat.
- add: support to new server version with channel creation api change.
- fix: bugs related with FCM Push Notifications.
- fix: bugs related with auto-delete messages.
- fix: bugs related with auto-delete messages.
- add: auto-delete messages.
- fix: some simplified Chinese translation.
- add: simplified Chinese.
- add: improvement on message retrieving.
- add: invitation link QR code and scanning.
- add: potential error message output during login.
- fix: UI in auth pages.
- fix: http websites does not open in Android.
- fix: UI error after deleting account.
- fix: data interference between servers if data is being loaded.
- fix: disable mentions and solve cursor issue in DMs.
- fix: improve online state stability.
- fix: archive messages might stay in loading status.
- fix: minor issues in invitation link validation.
- add: check updates and changelog.
- fix: disable super admin (uid == 1) access to deleting their account.
- fix: some files do not open due to path and file name issues.
- fix: add channel list comparison when connection establishes, delete extra ones if necessary.
- fix: invitation link validation might output wrongly with localhost server deployment.
- fix: check invitation link validity before jumping to sign up page.
